text.homeHeader: What do you need help with?
text.paidMemberHome: Are you a paid member? Get faster assistance.
text.enterPremiumEmail: Enter the email used to purchase your premium product
text.enterPremiumEmailInfo: You will receive a reference number to verify your order.
text.enterPremiumEmailError: Something went wrong with emailing your confirmation. Please try again.
text.enterReferenceInfo: Enter the reference number sent to ${email} below
text.enterReferenceSpam: *If you do not receive an email from us in a few minutes, check your “spam” folder or make sure you’ve entered the correct email associated with your order.
text.enterReferenceError: We couldn't verify this reference number. Please try again.
text.premiumBillingInfoDescription: Please contact Cleverbridge directly at cs@cleverbridge.com for any payment related issues.
text.blogInfo: Stay up to date with BitTorrent news and weekly reports.
text.helpCenterReview: How do you like the new help center?
text.cantFind: Can't find what you are looking for?
text.cantFindExpanded: If you have read through our documentation but still can’t find a solution to your issue, please create a ticket and we will get back to you.
text.ticketGetBackToYou: We will get back to you by email as soon as we can.
text.ticketPrefaceLine1: Before creating a ticket, please visit our ${link} and browse our extensive list of support articles.
text.ticketPrefaceLine2: Please provide a detailed description of the issue. You may consider including screenshots with your request to expedite the turnaround time.
text.ticketPrefaceLine3: Tickets submitted by Pro users will be responded to within 24-48 hours.
text.ticketPrefaceLine4: Due to the high volume of tickets from Free users, support responses may be delayed.
text.ticketEmail: Email Address* (so you can receive a response to your query)
text.ticketError: There was an error, please try again.
